author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENA STRENGTHENING AND EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS...
summary: ...LORENA STRENGTHENING AND EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS... As of 11:00 PM MST Tue Sep 02 the center of Lorena was located near 20.7, -110.0 with movement NW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENA STRENGTHENING AND EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS... As of 11:00 PM MST Tue Sep 02 the center of Lorena was located near 20.7, -110.0 with movement NW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
